sense.def:
Kadar je ena oseba ali stvar
like another
, imata obe podobne značilnosti ali se podobno vedeta.

seg.quote: He looked like Clark Gable.
She's very like her younger sister.
The lake was like a bright blue mirror.
She began to shake like a jelly.

sense.def:
Kadar nekoga vprašamo,
what something is like
, ga prosimo, naj nam nekaj opiše.

seg.quote: What was Essex like?
What did they taste like?

sense.def:
Izraz
like
lahko napove primer stvari, ki smo jo pravkar omenili.

seg.quote: You only get them in big countries, like Africa or India.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
like
lahko povemo, da je nekaj o določeni stvari res, ker je res o vseh stvareh take vrste.

seg.quote: There's no point in stirring up publicity about a foolish thing like this.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
like
lahko povemo, da je nekdo v enakem položaju kot neka druga oseba.

seg.quote: He, like everybody else, had worried about it.

sense.def:
Kadar rečemo, da je nekaj
like you remembered it
ali
like you imagined it
, hočemo povedati, da je takšno, kot se spominjamo ali smo si predstavljali;

seg.quote: Is it like you remembered it?
It didn't work out quite like I intended it to.

sense.def:
To like something
pomeni, da se nam nekaj zdi prijetno ali privlačno ali da tisto odobravamo.

seg.quote: She's a nice girl, I like her.
They didn't like what they saw.
I like reading.
Her folks like her to get in early.

gramGrp.pos:
VB
with or without
OBJ,
or
VB
with
TO-INF

sense.def:
Kadar nekdo
would like something
ali
would like to do something
, izrazi željo ali prošnjo, da bi nekaj imel ali storil.

seg.quote: I'd like to marry him.
Would you like some coffee?
He can stay here if he likes.
I'd like you to come.

sense.def:
If you like
rečemo, kadar ponujamo, da bi za nekoga nekaj storili.

seg.quote: I'll drive, if you like.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
and the like
povemo, da tistemu, kar pripovedujemo, lahko prištejemo še druge sorodne stvari.

seg.quote: ...the activities of ruthless mine owners and the like.

sense.def:
Izraze
like this
,
like that
ali
like so
uporabimo, kadar nekomu kažemo, kako se nekaj naredi.

seg.quote: Twist it round and put it on here, like that.

sense.def:
Včasih lahko uporabimo izraz
nothing like
namesto
not
, kadar želimo poudariti zanikanje.

seg.quote: The cast is nothing like as numerous as one might suppose.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
something like
povemo, da je neko število ali količina samo približna in ne natančna.

seg.quote: Something like ninety per cent of the crop was destroyed.
